title: [BUG REPORT] Syndra Ultimate cooldown
body:
Every time i would use my ult its cooldown indicator would show me that its almost ready when in actual fact it had over a minute to go

this actually got me killed the first time it happened.
i have screen-shotted it on multiple occasions to prove it wasn't a one time only thing.

all ill say is 'Clarity'

replies.body: At least someone has posted it! xD I play Syndra so often at the moment, and I have the same issue with her Ult... I have been meaning to report it, I just haven't been getting around to it.
ikr, so often, latest was reksai tunnel
This happened to me too! I can't remember which champion it was though, but I know that it was definitely not Syndra. I think it was with Irelia.
its really confusing and unless you're really onto it you can jump into conflict thinking you have your ult when you don't.
